DataElement.preferredName: Radical Prostate Therapy Not Participating Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: a date when a subject was removed from taking part in therapy to completely remove or stop the function of the prostate gland in the male reproductive system in order to alter the course of cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to not taking part in administering therapy to completely remove or stop the function of the prostate gland in the male reproductive system in order to alter the course of malignant disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: No Value Exists:A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of the decision that the patient will not receive radical prostatectomy or radiation therapy

DataElement.origin: NCIC CRF:National Cancer Institute of Canada Case Report Form
